name: Pingsy
description:
PingSy is a Conversation-First Platform on WhatsApp, designed to reinvent how businesses connect with their customers and teams. At our core, we believe conversations drive relationships — and PingSy empowers organizations to deliver faster, more human, and more meaningful interactions.
With PingSy, businesses can manage all WhatsApp conversations seamlessly in one place — from customer support and real-time updates to team collaboration and internal workflows. Our platform is built to simplify communication, reduce response times, and create delightful customer experiences at scale.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Engagement Platform: Empowering businesses with Broadcasting Automation, Live Chat & Chatbots
WhatsApp Cloud API: Secure & scalable integration for technology enablers
Partner Solutions: Seamless integrations for marketplaces, CRMs, ERPs, and SaaS technology providers
